Increased the calculators listing from 37 to 600+.
Users can see supplemental drug interaction information in Drug interaction section.
Users can land directly to the drug monograph / a specific section of a drug monograph from guidelines.
Doc Alerts can be launched to the device as a series based on user “Read” action.
Upgraded iOS App to use SDK 10.3.

Thanks for using Epocrates! To make your experience even better, we update the app regularly. Here’s what’s new:

Favorite your most used Calculators for quicker access
Other bug fixes and performance improvements

The addition of monthly subscriptions for Epocrates Plus, now just $16.99/month!
Timely Peer-reviewed disease content from the BMJ
Updated Calculators, Labs, ICD-10 codes, and more medical content

Thanks for using epocrates! We fixed bugs with this update.

Thanks for using epocrates. We've made some updates:

- 14-day free trial available for all new users!

Thanks for using epocrates! We've made some updates:

- A faster, more efficient search experience
- Tables now available via Search
- CCPA compliance: Removal of second email and phone number
